pages.text: Red Matter is good and all, but if you want even more power, Blue Matter is the stuff you're looking for.

Blue Matter takes the already great Red Matter and turns it up to 11. Created by using a large amount of mana to forcefully bind Red Matter with certain other materials, you'd be hard pressed to find anything better than it.
Blue Matter can be used to upgrade your Red Matter tools even further beyond! It also condenses multiple tools into 1 single item, saving on space.

As you might have expected, Blue Matter can be used to upgrade armor as well. The damage reduction is still 90%, but you get a plethora of useful abilities, the main one being the ability to fly, for free, with no limits.
Blue Matter, like the other 2 matters before it, can once again be used to upgrade your collectors and relays. This provides yet another 4x boost to all their stats.
